Solar Weather¶

the file containing the code for fetching solar weather

class src.solar_weather_fetcher.SolarWeatherFetcher¶

Class for fetching the solar weather data that comes from the NOAA website.

static fetch_website_data(url: <module 'string' from '/Users/mauricebugg/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.9/string.py'>) → list¶

Requests the HTML content from the NOAA website containing the data for solar weather in the last 24 hours Args:

url: the url that we want to fetch

Returns:

lst: a list of each minute of solar weather data (time, density, speed, temperature) for the last 24 hours

static format_website_data() → <module 'string' from '/Users/mauricebugg/opt/anaconda3/lib/python3.9/string.py'>¶

Gets the list of solar weather data from the NOAA website and converts it into a more readable string

Returns:

formatted_str: string containing the data formatted in a readable way
